b:includable.b:comment: Some features are blocked on purpose for consistent design and functioning

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:includable.b:comment: There is the bug that does not check whethere the older post exists or not. Not our fault. Blogger team needs to fix it.

b:eval.expr: snippet(data:post.body, { length: 350, links: false, linebreaks: false })

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons
